titleStmt.title: A Full and true relation of the remarkable fight betwixt Capt. Hamilton and Capt. Brown, commanders of the two Scotch frigats, and three French men of war that brought over the Irish men to joyn Dundee in the Western sea, as it was delivered to some of the privy counsellors in Scotland, by those that were eye witnesses during the whole action.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
